metadata.name: FEARLESS WORKWEAR #1/30
metadata.description:
Introducing the 'Fearless Workwear' hoodie, a representation of the attitude we need to have this year. This hoodie exists in both physical form and as a one-of-a-kind NFT, embodying the fearless spirit that is required to push boundaries and break the mold. 

The bold design represents the attitude we need to have to overcome the challenges we face. Wear it to the office or on the streets, this hoodie represents the intersection of streetwear and the future. 

Owning this hoodie in both physical form and NFT is the ultimate statement of fearlessness.

Holders are able to redeem the physical Hoodie via https://www.makehappen.de/contact from March 1 through June 31, 2023 or just stop by the office and pick it up.

Get your free Hoodie now by visiting our Manifold claim page and connecting your wallet to the server.  
Only one token per wallet.  
*just pay gas

Digital Collectible: Wearable  
Category Memberships
